text: Idi (ji pisti ser kirina celeke) me ji wan ra gotiye: â€œHun hineki ji gewde celeke u hinek ji ji gewde kusti li hev bixin. (Ji pisti li hev xistina gewdan, kujraw hate diyar kirine). Bi vi awayi Yezdan mirya ji zinde dike u Yezdan beratene xwe dide nisane we. Bi rasti hevi heye, ku hun ji wan his hildin
